text: Lalle ne haƙĩƙa Allah Ya gaskata wa ManzonSa mafarkinsa da gaskiya: Lalle zã ku shiga Masallacin Harami, in Allah Ya so, kunã mãsu natsuwa, mãsu aske kawunanku da mãsu sui suye, bã ku jin tsõro, dõmin (Allah) Ya san abin da ba ku sani ba, sa'an nan Ya sanya wani cin nasara makusanci a bãyan wannan
